assignments: Design and implement Client project, contract management system that includes object oriented component creation and reporting
Concrete responsibilities include:
Design, implement, and manage cloud infrastructure as IaaS using Terraform, Azure CLI/Powershell, and Azure Portal
Design, develop and unit test the SaaS solution on frontend, backend, database, and DevOps with Java Spring Boot, Liquibase, SQL, and TypeScript + Next.js.
Implement of OIDC based authentication
Design and implement deployment pipelines across multiple environments for the project
Code profiling and optimisation
Implement Monitoring and Alerting in Prometheus and Grafana
Distribute tasks and coordinate within the team

items.employer_name: Vienna University of Economics and Business
assignments: My responsibilities in this position were:
Fullstack developed on new student portal with a stronger focus on the Frontend in React.js, FastApi and OracleDB
Co-setup and Upgraded Keycloak server to latest version upon major changes
Implemented of keycloak custom extensions for authenticating against ID-Austria and in-house stored credentials
Developed OIDC authentication application against in-house Keycloak server in NodeJs and FastApi
My duty in this period included 4 major tasks
Implemented and deployed Cloud native Infrastructure IaC using ARM Template and Azure Blueprint with custom tagging.
Implemented and optimise existing Azure DevOps pipeline.
Fullstack development of cloud native app that does time tracking in Angular, Java Springboot, H2/MSSQL and blob storage.
Implemented HO compliance feature on client project that manipulates DB Data and csv export.
My daily duties in UNIDO included:
Host and maintain dockerised on-premise Gitlab server and runner
Design, implement and maintain GL CI/CD pipelines
Fullstack development with vue.js and node.js
Drupal CMS feature/custom module development and maintanence
E2E testing with selenium IDE
Manage 1 offshore contractor
Create ArcGis Dashboard with python based data importer
